page.title: 08Gargrave, Recreation.
page.content:
There are good facilities for{Football and{Cricket}on grounds provided by the {Coulthurst Trust.}Teams play in local leagues.
The{Craven Tennis Club}has its courts in Gargrave, There is an excellent green for{Bowls}at 'The Mason's Arms'.
There is good{fishing}in the River Aire, villagers having the right to fish from the Greens. {Coarse fishing is a popular activity on the Leeds and Liverpool Canal.
Apart from the Pennine Way, there is a good network of footpaths round the village for{walking}and{jogging.
The Pendle{Hunt}meets on the Low Green on Boxing Day.
